hashDemux 0.1.0

    • clustering-based sample demultiplexing

    clustering-based sample demux

    clustering_based_demux.Rd

    clustering-based sample demux

    clustering_based_demux(
  seurat_object,
  assay = "HTO",
  expected_doublet_rate = NULL,
  nCores = NULL
)

    Arguments

    seurat_object

    Seurat object

    assay

    Assay name in seurat_object with hash tag counts matrix (default: HTO)

    expected_doublet_rate

    proportion of droplets expected to be doublets. If value is NULL (default), it will be automatically determined.

    Value

    A Seurat object (obj) with three columns added to obj@meta.data. sampleBC column has tag assignment for each cell with doublets represented as "tag1_tag2". classification column has global classification information i.e. cells are classified as "Doublet", "Singlet"or "Negative".

    confidence_scorea per-cell value between 0 and 1 with confidence score for the demultiplexing result

    Examples

    # library(Seurat)
# library(dplyr)
# seurat_object = seurat_object %>% NormalizeData(normalization.method = "CLR",margin = 2)
# seurat_object = clustering_based_demux( seurat_object, assay = "HTO")
